detail_desc: Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted, mirrored lenses.
Sports top in soft, fast-drying, functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a longer inner top with a racer back. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Blouse in an airy, weave with a V-neck, buttons and pin-tucks down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and short, flounced sleeves. Unlined.
Hat in soft thermal fleece.
Double-layered, rectangular scarf in satin made from recycled polyester.
Trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, fake pockets and long legs with a tab and button.

Dress in woven fabric with a unique nursing feature, a collar, and long sleeves with a tab and button. Seam at the waist and side pockets. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Sleeveless, cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a double-layered trim at the hem that wraps over at the front.
Vest top in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with decorative buttons at the top.
Straw hat with a fabric band. Lined. Width of brim 2.5 cm.

prod_name: BB FUNC Air Ski Snow Pants
detail_desc: Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Adjustable hook and loop tab at the sides, a zip fly and press-stud and zipped side pockets. Reinforced hems with snow flaps. Detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Long-sleeved tunic in jersey crêpe with a rounded hem.
Two-button jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels, a fake pocket at the top, welt front pockets with a flap, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Double-breasted pea coat in sturdy twill with welt side pockets, an inner pocket, a tab with a button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in pleated jersey with an elasticated waist and a raw-edge, laser-cut hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif at the top, hood and zip down the front. Front pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and an elasticated hem.
Wide padded satin Alice band. Width 4 cm.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline, opening with ties at the back of the neck, 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow trims, and a gathered flounce at the hem for added width. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Short velvet dress with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck, shoulder pads and long sleeves. Unlined.
Water bottle in patterned plastic with a screw top and wrist strap. Capacity 550 ml.

Long-sleeved shirt in soft twill with a concealed button-down collar, flap chest pockets, a yoke at the back and buttoned cuffs. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Set with a top in cotton jersey and trousers in woven fabric. Long-sleeved top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a print motif on the front. Trousers with concealed, adjustable elastication and a press-stud at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Sturdy hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
High-waisted jersey trousers in a viscose blend with a fake back pocket and flared legs with sewn-in creases at the front.

Long dress in an airy, patterned weave with flounces. Round neckline with a V-shaped opening and ties at the top and flounces at the front. Long puff sleeves with smocking and a flounce at the cuffs and a frilled seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Shirt in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Mesh lining.
Waist belt in imitation suede with decorative metal details and an antiqued metal buckle with an adjustable section at the front. Width 2.5 cm.
Fully lined, ribbed, textured swimsuit with a low-cut back and shoulder straps with decorative plastic buckles.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back. Fake welt back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, covered heels, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings. Heel 3.5 cm.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Top in airy, textured jersey with a deep V-neck, decorative knot detail at the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Sports joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, taped details and side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for extra mobility and wide ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Wide, cold shoulder top in a soft rib-knit viscose blend with short raglan sleeves with a tie detail.

Foldaway waist bag in woven fabric with one large zipped compartment at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic snap lock. One zipped inner compartment into which the bag can be easily folded and enclosed, and a practical carry strap for when the bag is folded up. Size 5x18x32 cm. Size when folded up 3x11.5x15.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with a collar, zip at the top and short sleeves.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke at the back, a tie-front hem and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Metal earrings in various designs. Three pairs of hoops and one pair with hanging hoops. Diameter 1.5 cm-3 cm.
Shirt in a printed cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Top with dropped shoulders, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist and lightly brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front.
Fitted dress in superstretch, crinkled velour with a sheen. Small stand-up collar and long sleeves. Round, cut-out section at the back and a large hook-and-eye at the back of the neck. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with raw roll edges around the neckline and sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Dress in sturdy, textured stretch jersey with a slight sheen. V-neck, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist with a decorative band and metal details. Flared skirt with pleats to create soft draping. Lined.

prod_name: Make him pay for it PREMIUM
detail_desc: Long cardigan knitted in a soft wool and alpaca blend with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
T-shirt in washed cotton jersey with a concealed fastening on one shoulder and small chest pocket. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Socks in a soft fine-knit with elasticated tops.
Short, fitted, one-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with a cut-out section at the top and one long sleeve.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a faux fur pompom on the top and sewn-in turn-up with an appliqué.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs fastenings, short sleeves and short legs.
Treggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. One patterned pair, one in a solid colour.
Sandals in soft imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Adjustable heel strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles.
Pyjamas in a patterned viscose weave. Top with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.

Round bag in glittery imitation leather with appliqués and embroidery. Shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end, a zip at the top and a decorative faux fur pompom. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Width 4 cm. Diameter 13 cm.
Metal chain bracelet with shells and shell-shaped pendants. Adjustable length 18-22 cm.
Sandals with crossover straps in imitation leather with a large decorative metal buckle, moulded insoles and fluted soles. Platform approx. 3.5 cm.
Loose-fitting jersey top with a V-neck at the front and short sleeves.
Pull-on trousers in patterned cotton twill with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Seams at the knees and ribbed hems. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved top in mesh with glittery sequins, an opening and button at the back of the neck, an asymmetric wrapover front and back, and a frill at the hem.
Oversized, long-sleeved top in marled sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered appliqué, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details, a back section in ventilating mesh and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
V-neck tunic in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and buttons at the front. Gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. The tunic is made partly from recycled polyester.

Padded parka with a lined, faux fur-trimmed hood and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets and a small zipped pocket on each sleeve. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and bottom. V-neck, short puff sleeves with concealed elastication, a seam at the waist and a draped skirt with an asymmetric hem. Lined.
